name: Tic, Tac, Scissors
description:
Win a game of Tic Tac Toe against an other human or the computer.  Use Rock Paper Scissors mechanics to capture opponents fields. The last move is protected by a shield for one turn. This prevents the opponent to re-capture the field instantly. Use the Escape key to exit the game and return to the main menu. This is a game for the Hyper Casual Game Jam.  Made in about a day with the restrictions to only use 3 colors. 

Credits:

Sound & Music from OpenGameArt.org

  • Main Menu Music by Fato Shadow
  • Ingame Music by Sam "Goor00" Collard
